comments.text:
A massive L to netflix for not given the gorillaz a chance to get a movie.

comments.text: It’s difficult to state how happy I am to see Jaime and Damon working together and using the same collaborative styles that go in to the music. And almost more than anything it’s so wonderful to see how many people are appreciating it.
comments.author: @ThatLanaLady

comments.text: 6:30 I think Noodle says something like, "Time to go" or "I love you". Idk but either way the end really hit me. Been a Gorillaz fan since the first album and seeing them grow along with me has been a treat. Love Gorillaz now and forever ❤⛰️
comments.author: @awsomesmasher23
